sections.heading: Ep 4. Talking with Sarah Slattery, Managing Director of Slattery

sections.content: This week we talk with +[Sarah Slattery](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarah-slattery-3a695637/)+. Sarah is the Managing Director of +[Slattery](https://slattery.com.au/)+, Melbourne's leading Quantity Surveying and Cost Planning consultancy with offices across Australia.

We discuss Sarah's career and Slattery's 40 years in the industry, business culture, managing teams and people through Covid and workplace flexibility. We also touch upon her position and responsibilities as the first Woman Managing Director in a QS consulting firm here in Australia (possibly the world!), TEN Women a local network for Women in Property, and much more.
If you are interested in Melbourne projects, Quantity Surveying consulting, and listening to an engaging public speaker….then have a listen!

+[The Building Talks Podcast](https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-building-talks-podcast/?viewAsMember=true)+ is brought to you by +[Building Environs Recruitment](https://www.buildingenvirons.com.au/)+ – specialising in Built Environment recruiting: exclusive, executive and retained searches for Building Contractors, Consultants, Engineers, and Property Development here in Melbourne.
